name: Helen Jane's White Sangria
description: My hallmark recipe for the most colorful summertime cooler. Beautiful and delicious.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Grand Marnier or orange flavored liqueur
1 1.5 L (or 2 bottles of 750ml) Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc

recipeInstructions.text: In a large container, sprinkle the fruit (kiwis, peaches and sliced strawberries) with 1/4 cup of sugar.
Pour 1/2 cup white rum on top of the fruit and let it sit for at least an hour, but no more than 4 hours.
Add the white wine and white grape juice. Stir until combined.
Taste and add more sugar if necessary.
Stir, chill, and add ice just before serving.
